title: Solutions Architect Interview Guide
description: Demonstrate technical design and customer-facing skills.

content.text: Solutions Architect interviews assess your ability to design technical solutions for customers while communicating effectively with both technical and business stakeholders.

**What interviewers assess:**

- Technical breadth across cloud/infrastructure
- Architecture design skills
- Customer communication and requirements gathering
- Ability to translate business needs to technical solutions
- Pre-sales and technical advisory experience

**Typical SA interview loop:**

1. **Recruiter screen** (30 min)
2. **Hiring manager screen** (60 min)
3. **Onsite/Virtual loop** (4-5 hours):
   - Technical deep dive/architecture design
   - Customer scenario role play
   - Whiteboard architecture session
   - Behavioral/leadership round
Practice presenting technical architectures to non-technical audiences. The ability to simplify without losing accuracy is crucial.

items.text: Review cloud architecture patterns and best practices
Prepare customer success stories with technical details
Review the company's products and typical use cases
Prepare for role-play scenarios with difficult customers
Brush up on relevant certifications content
